password-hints.straight_rows_of_keys_are_easy_to_guess: Straight rows of keys are easy to guess.
password-hints.short_keyboard_patterns_are_easy_to_gues: Short keyboard patterns are easy to guess.
password-hints.use_a_longer_keyboard_pattern_with_more_: Use a longer keyboard pattern with more turns.
password-hints.repeats_like_\"aaa\"_are_easy_to_guess: Repeats like "aaa" are easy to guess.
password-hints.repeats_like_\"abcabcabc\"_are_only_slig: Repeats like "abcabcabc" are only slightly harder to guess than "abc".
password-hints.sequences_like_abc_or_6543_are_easy_to_g: Sequences like abc or 6543 are easy to guess.
password-hints.recent_years_are_easy_to_guess: Recent years are easy to guess.
password-hints.dates_are_often_easy_to_guess: Dates are often easy to guess.
password-hints.this_is_a_top-10_common_password: This is a top-10 common password.
password-hints.this_is_a_top-100_common_password: This is a top-100 common password.
password-hints.this_is_a_very_common_password: This is a very common password.
password-hints.this_is_similar_to_a_commonly_used_passw: This is similar to a commonly used password.
password-hints.a_word_by_itself_is_easy_to_guess: A word by itself is easy to guess.
password-hints.names_and_surnames_by_themselves_are_eas: Names and surnames by themselves are easy to guess.
password-hints.common_names_and_surnames_are_easy_to_gu: Common names and surnames are easy to guess.
password-hints.avoid_dates_associated_with_you: Avoid dates that are associated with you.
password-hints.common_substitutions_dont_help: Common substitutions like @ for a don't help very much.
password-hints.add_another_word_or_two_uncommon_words_a: Add another word or two; uncommon words are better.
password-hints.predictable_substitutions_like_'@'_inste: Predictable substitutions like '@' instead of 'a' don't help very much.
password-hints.use_a_few_words_avoid_common_phrases: Use a few words, avoid common phrases.
password-hints.no_need_for_symbols_digits_or_uppercase_: No need for symbols, digits, or uppercase letters.
password-hints.avoid_years_that_are_associated_with_you: Avoid years that are associated with you.
password-hints.avoid_dates_and_years_that_are_associate: Avoid dates and years that are associated with you.
password-hints.all_uppercase_is_almost_as_easy_to_guess: All-uppercase is almost as easy to guess as all-lowercase.
